content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty finding courses that fit a flexible schedule",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Course scheduling tool that allows users to filter by time and date availability",
    "content_solution": "Write a blog that provides tips on how to find courses that fit your schedule",
    "competitors": ["Coursera", "Udemy", "Skillshare"],
    "differentiator": "More focused on flexible scheduling options"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Trouble finding courses that align with specific interests",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Course recommendation tool that suggests courses based on users' interests and past courses taken",
    "content_solution": "Start a YouTube channel that provides insights and reviews on different courses",
    "competitors": ["LinkedIn Learning", "MasterClass"],
    "differentiator": "More personalized course recommendations"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to courses due to geographic location or language barriers",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Partner with existing online course providers to offer courses in different languages and regions",
    "content_solution": "Create a podcast that interviews people who have overcome language and geographic barriers to access education",
    "competitors": ["Babbel", "Duolingo", "Rosetta Stone"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on course access for non-native English speakers and underrepresented regions"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of motivation and accountability when taking online courses",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Build an accountability platform that allows users to connect with accountability partners and track their progress",
    "content_solution": "Write an eBook that provides tips and tricks for staying motivated and accountable while taking online courses",
    "competitors": ["edX", "Khan Academy", "OnlineDegree.com"],
    "differentiator": "Focus solely on accountability and motivation"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Inability to find courses that align with budget constraints",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Course search engine that allows users to filter by price and provides information on financial aid and scholarships",
    "content_solution": "Start a blog that provides insights and reviews on different free or low-cost courses",
    "competitors": ["Codecademy", "FreeCodeCamp", "MIT OpenCourseWare"],
    "differentiator": "Focus on finding free or low-cost courses"
  }
]
